channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Photos: Stars protest ICE with pins and in acceptance speeches at Grammys
item.description: Stars at the Grammys protested President Trump's immigration policies in speeches and by wearing pins saying "ICE OUT" at Sunday's event in Los Angele...

item.title: AI is coming for rodeo, the last major U.S. sport untouched by analytics
item.description: Eight seconds on a bull has always been about instinct, not data. That's starting to change, as artificial intelligence moves into rodeo arenas and br...

item.title: After Liam Ramos' release, Democrats turn focus to the rest of the kids detained by ICE
item.description: Rep. Joaquin Castro (D-Texas) vowed to continue his campaign against the immigration detention of children after picking up 5-year-old Liam Ramos from...

item.title: Investors are betting on robots to replace blue collar workers
item.description: AI startups are raising billions of dollars to develop "brains" for robots that could work everywhere from oil rigs to construction sites. Why it matt...

item.title: Trump says "broken" Kennedy Center will shut for 2-year renovations
item.description: The Kennedy Center will close for renovations on July 4 for about two years, President Trump announced Sunday. The big picture: The president's announ...

item.title: Trump family crypto firm sold major stake to UAE investment firm
item.description: The investment, worth a reported $500 million, gave Emirati-backed investors a 49 percent stake in World Liberty Financial, a Trump crypto company.

item.title: Trump team has $400 million, and 5 other campaign money takeaways
item.description: The Democratic Party on the national level has a mere fraction of what Republicans have heading into the 2026 midterms. Big donors like Elon Musk are ...

item.title: House GOP seeks to push funding bill through its razor-thin margin
item.description: House Democrats have indicated privately that they do not plan to support the plan, leaving Republicans to go it alone.

item.title: House speaker ‘confident’ partial shutdown will end by Tuesday
item.description: Speaker Mike Johnson says he’s prepared to pass funding measures, already approved by the Senate, with the sole support of House Republicans.

item.title: In Texas, Democrats narrow GOP’s U.S. House majority, win upset in state Senate
item.description: Democrats flipped a state Senate district that President Donald Trump won by double digits. In a House election, the outcome slimmed the GOP’s margin ...

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
